alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 12:01AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A couple of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Ellis and northwestern Navarro Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a couple of strong thunderstorms over Italy and Blooming Grove, or 16 miles west of Corsicana, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Ennis, Italy, Blooming Grove, Bardwell, Alma, Barry, Bardwell Lake, Rice, Garrett, Frost, Emhouse, Reagor Springs, Dresden, Avalon and Howard. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 383 and 388. Interstate 45 between mile markers 234 and 253. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
